title: The Jira Cloud platform REST API
description: Jira Cloud platform REST API documentation

auth_username.label: Username (basicAuth)
auth_username.note: You can access this resource via basic auth.

auth_password.label: Password (basicAuth)
auth_password.note: You can access this resource via basic auth.

getCustomFieldConfiguration.title: Get custom field configurations
getCustomFieldConfiguration.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of configurations for a custom field created by a [Forge app](https://developer

getApplicationProperty.title: Get application property
getApplicationProperty.description: Returns all application properties or an application property

getAdvancedSettings.title: Get advanced settings
getAdvancedSettings.description: Returns the application properties that are accessible on the *Advanced Settings* page

getAttachmentMeta.title: Get Jira attachment settings
getAttachmentMeta.description: Returns the attachment settings, that is, whether attachments are enabled and the maximum attachment size allowed

expandAttachmentForHumans.title: Get all metadata for an expanded attachment
expandAttachmentForHumans.description: Returns the metadata for the contents of an attachment, if it is an archive, and metadata for the attachment itself

expandAttachmentForMachines.title: Get contents metadata for an expanded attachment
expandAttachmentForMachines.description: Returns the metadata for the contents of an attachment, if it is an archive

getAuditRecords.title: Get audit records
getAuditRecords.description: Returns a list of audit records

getAllSystemAvatars.title: Get system avatars by type
getAllSystemAvatars.description: Returns a list of system avatar details by owner type, where the owner types are issue type, project, or user

getCommentPropertyKeys.title: Get comment property keys
getCommentPropertyKeys.description: Returns the keys of all the properties of a comment

getComponentRelatedIssues.title: Get component issues count
getComponentRelatedIssues.description: Returns the counts of issues assigned to the component

getSelectedTimeTrackingImplementation.title: Get selected time tracking provider
getSelectedTimeTrackingImplementation.description: Returns the time tracking provider that is currently selected

getAllDashboards.title: Get all dashboards
getAllDashboards.description: Returns a list of dashboards owned by or shared with the user

getDashboardItemPropertyKeys.title: Get dashboard item property keys
getDashboardItemPropertyKeys.description: Returns the keys of all properties for a dashboard item

getFields.title: Get fields
getFields.description:
Returns system and custom issue fields according to the following rules:

 *  Fields that cannot be added to the issue navigator are always returned

getFieldsPaginated.title: Get fields paginated
getFieldsPaginated.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of fields for Classic Jira projects

getDefaultValues.title: Get custom field contexts default values
getDefaultValues.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of defaults for a custom field

getIssueTypeMappingsForContexts.title: Get issue types for custom field context
getIssueTypeMappingsForContexts.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of context to issue type mappings for a custom field

getProjectContextMapping.title: Get project mappings for custom field context
getProjectContextMapping.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of context to project mappings for a custom field

getOptionsForContext.title: Get custom field options (context)
getOptionsForContext.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all custom field option for a context

getContextsForFieldDeprecated.title: Get contexts for a field
getContextsForFieldDeprecated.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of the contexts a field is used in

getScreensForField.title: Get screens for a field
getScreensForField.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of the screens a field is used in

getAllIssueFieldOptions.title: Get all issue field options
getAllIssueFieldOptions.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all the options of a select list issue field

getSelectableIssueFieldOptions.title: Get selectable issue field options
getSelectableIssueFieldOptions.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of options for a select list issue field that can be viewed and selected by the user

getVisibleIssueFieldOptions.title: Get visible issue field options
getVisibleIssueFieldOptions.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of options for a select list issue field that can be viewed by the user

getAllFieldConfigurations.title: Get all field configurations
getAllFieldConfigurations.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of field configurations

getFieldConfigurationItems.title: Get field configuration items
getFieldConfigurationItems.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all fields for a configuration

getAllFieldConfigurationSchemes.title: Get all field configuration schemes
getAllFieldConfigurationSchemes.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of field configuration schemes

getFieldConfigurationSchemeMappings.title: Get field configuration issue type items
getFieldConfigurationSchemeMappings.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of field configuration issue type items

getFieldConfigurationSchemeProjectMappin.title: Get field configuration schemes for projects
getFieldConfigurationSchemeProjectMappin.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of field configuration schemes and, for each scheme, a list of the projects that use it

getDefaultShareScope.title: Get default share scope
getDefaultShareScope.description: Returns the default sharing settings for new filters and dashboards for a user

getFavouriteFilters.title: Get favorite filters
getFavouriteFilters.description: Returns the visible favorite filters of the user

getMyFilters.title: Get my filters
getMyFilters.description: Returns the filters owned by the user

getColumns.title: Get columns
getColumns.description: Returns the columns configured for a filter

getSharePermissions.title: Get share permissions
getSharePermissions.description: Returns the share permissions for a filter

getUsersFromGroup.title: Get users from group
getUsersFromGroup.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all users in a group

findGroups.title: Find groups
findGroups.description: Returns a list of groups whose names contain a query string

findUsersAndGroups.title: Find users and groups
findUsersAndGroups.description: Returns a list of users and groups matching a string

getLicense.title: Get license
getLicense.description: Returns licensing information about the Jira instance

getCreateIssueMeta.title: Get create issue metadata
getCreateIssueMeta.description: Returns details of projects, issue types within projects, and, when requested, the create screen fields for each issue type for the user

getIssuePickerResource.title: Get issue picker suggestions
getIssuePickerResource.description: Returns lists of issues matching a query string

getChangeLogs.title: Get changelogs
getChangeLogs.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all changelogs for an issue sorted by date, starting from the oldest

getComments.title: Get comments
getComments.description: Returns all comments for an issue

getEditIssueMeta.title: Get edit issue metadata
getEditIssueMeta.description: Returns the edit screen fields for an issue that are visible to and editable by the user

getIssuePropertyKeys.title: Get issue property keys
getIssuePropertyKeys.description: Returns the URLs and keys of an issue's properties

getRemoteIssueLinks.title: Get remote issue links
getRemoteIssueLinks.description: Returns the remote issue links for an issue

getTransitions.title: Get transitions
getTransitions.description: Returns either all transitions or a transition that can be performed by the user on an issue, based on the issue's status

getVotes.title: Get votes
getVotes.description: Returns details about the votes on an issue

getIssueWatchers.title: Get issue watchers
getIssueWatchers.description: Returns the watchers for an issue

getIssueWorklog.title: Get issue worklogs
getIssueWorklog.description: Returns worklogs for an issue, starting from the oldest worklog or from the worklog started on or after a date and time

getWorklogPropertyKeys.title: Get worklog property keys
getWorklogPropertyKeys.description: Returns the keys of all properties for a worklog

getIssueLinkTypes.title: Get issue link types
getIssueLinkTypes.description: Returns a list of all issue link types

getIssueAllTypes.title: Get all issue types for user

getIssueTypesForProject.title: Get issue types for project
getIssueTypesForProject.description: Returns issue types for a project

getAlternativeIssueTypes.title: Get alternative issue types
getAlternativeIssueTypes.description: Returns a list of issue types that can be used to replace the issue type

getAllIssueTypeSchemes.title: Get all issue type schemes
getAllIssueTypeSchemes.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type schemes

getIssueTypeSchemesMapping.title: Get issue type scheme items
getIssueTypeSchemesMapping.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type scheme items

getIssueTypeSchemeForProjects.title: Get issue type schemes for projects
getIssueTypeSchemeForProjects.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type schemes and, for each issue type scheme, a list of the projects that use it

getIssueTypeScreenSchemes.title: Get issue type screen schemes
getIssueTypeScreenSchemes.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type screen schemes

getIssueTypeScreenSchemeMappings.title: Get issue type screen scheme items
getIssueTypeScreenSchemeMappings.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type screen scheme items

getIssueTypeScreenSchemeProjectAssociati.title: Get issue type screen schemes for projects
getIssueTypeScreenSchemeProjectAssociati.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of issue type screen schemes and, for each issue type screen scheme, a list of the projects that use it

getProjectsForIssueTypeScreenScheme.title: Get issue type screen scheme projects
getProjectsForIssueTypeScreenScheme.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of projects associated with an issue type screen scheme

getAutoComplete.title: Get field reference data (GET)
getAutoComplete.description: Returns reference data for JQL searches

getFieldAutoCompleteForQueryString.title: Get field auto complete suggestions
getFieldAutoCompleteForQueryString.description: Returns the JQL search auto complete suggestions for a field

getMyPermissions.title: Get my permissions
getMyPermissions.description: Returns a list of permissions indicating which permissions the user has

getPreference.title: Get preference
getPreference.description: Returns the value of a preference of the current user

getLocale.title: Get locale
getLocale.description: Returns the locale for the user

getCurrentUser.title: Get current user
getCurrentUser.description: Returns details for the current user

getAllPermissions.title: Get all permissions
getAllPermissions.description:
Returns all permissions, including:

 *  global permissions

getPermissionSchemeGrants.title: Get permission scheme grants
getPermissionSchemeGrants.description: Returns all permission grants for a permission scheme

getPriorities.title: Get priorities
getPriorities.description: Returns the list of all issue priorities

getAllProjects.title: Get all projects
getAllProjects.description: Returns all projects visible to the user

getRecent.title: Get recent projects
getRecent.description: Returns a list of up to 20 projects recently viewed by the user that are still visible to the user

searchProjects.title: Get projects paginated
searchProjects.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of projects visible to the user

getAccessibleProjectTypeByKey.title: Get accessible project type by key

getAllProjectAvatars.title: Get all project avatars
getAllProjectAvatars.description: Returns all project avatars, grouped by system and custom avatars

getProjectComponentsPaginated.title: Get project components paginated
getProjectComponentsPaginated.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all components in a project

getProjectComponents.title: Get project components
getProjectComponents.description: Returns all components in a project

getFeaturesForProject.title: Get project features
getFeaturesForProject.description: Returns the list of features for a project

getAllStatuses.title: Get all statuses for project
getAllStatuses.description: Returns the valid statuses for a project

getProjectVersionsPaginated.title: Get project versions paginated
getProjectVersionsPaginated.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all versions in a project

getProjectVersions.title: Get project versions
getProjectVersions.description: Returns all versions in a project

getHierarchy.title: Get project issue type hierarchy
getHierarchy.description: Get the issue type hierarchy for a next-gen project

validateProjectKey.title: Validate project key
validateProjectKey.description: Validates a project key by confirming the key is a valid string and not in use

getValidProjectKey.title: Get valid project key
getValidProjectKey.description: Validates a project key and, if the key is invalid or in use, generates a valid random string for the project key

getValidProjectName.title: Get valid project name
getValidProjectName.description: Checks that a project name isn't in use

getResolutions.title: Get resolutions
getResolutions.description: Returns a list of all issue resolution values

getAllProjectRoles.title: Get all project roles
getAllProjectRoles.description: Gets a list of all project roles, complete with project role details and default actors

getProjectRoleActorsForRole.title: Get default actors for project role
getProjectRoleActorsForRole.description: Returns the [default actors](#api-rest-api-3-resolution-get) for the project role

getScreens.title: Get screens
getScreens.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all screens or those specified by one or more screen IDs

getAvailableScreenFields.title: Get available screen fields
getAvailableScreenFields.description: Returns the fields that can be added to a tab on a screen

getAllScreenTabs.title: Get all screen tabs
getAllScreenTabs.description: Returns the list of tabs for a screen

getAllScreenTabFields.title: Get all screen tab fields
getAllScreenTabFields.description: Returns all fields for a screen tab

getScreenSchemes.title: Get screen schemes
getScreenSchemes.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of screen schemes

getServerInfo.title: Get Jira instance info
getServerInfo.description: Returns information about the Jira instance

getIssueNavigatorDefaultColumns.title: Get issue navigator default columns
getIssueNavigatorDefaultColumns.description: Returns the default issue navigator columns

getStatuses.title: Get all statuses
getStatuses.description: Returns a list of all statuses associated with workflows

getStatusCategories.title: Get all status categories
getStatusCategories.description: Returns a list of all status categories

findBulkAssignableUsers.title: Find users assignable to projects
findBulkAssignableUsers.description: Returns a list of users who can be assigned issues in one or more projects

findAssignableUsers.title: Find users assignable to issues
findAssignableUsers.description: Returns a list of users that can be assigned to an issue

bulkGetUsers.title: Bulk get users
bulkGetUsers.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of the users specified by one or more account IDs

bulkGetUsersMigration.title: Get account IDs for users
bulkGetUsersMigration.description: Returns the account IDs for the users specified in the `key` or `username` parameters

getUserGroups.title: Get user groups
getUserGroups.description: Returns the groups to which a user belongs

findUsersWithAllPermissions.title: Find users with permissions
findUsersWithAllPermissions.description:
Returns a list of users who fulfill these criteria:

 *  their user attributes match a search string

findUsersForPicker.title: Find users for picker
findUsersForPicker.description: Returns a list of users whose attributes match the query term

getUserPropertyKeys.title: Get user property keys
getUserPropertyKeys.description: Returns the keys of all properties for a user

findUsers.title: Find users
findUsers.description: Returns a list of users that match the search string and property

findUsersByQuery.title: Find users by query
findUsersByQuery.description: Finds users with a structured query and returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of user details

findUserKeysByQuery.title: Find user keys by query
findUserKeysByQuery.description: Finds users with a structured query and returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of user keys

findUsersWithBrowsePermission.title: Find users with browse permission
findUsersWithBrowsePermission.description:
Returns a list of users who fulfill these criteria:

 *  their user attributes match a search string

getAllUsersDefault.title: Get all users default
getAllUsersDefault.description: Returns a list of all (active and inactive) users

getAllUsers.title: Get all users
getAllUsers.description: Returns a list of all (active and inactive) users

getVersionRelatedIssues.title: Get version's related issues count
getVersionRelatedIssues.description:
Returns the following counts for a version:

 *  Number of issues where the `fixVersion` is set to the version

getVersionUnresolvedIssues.title: Get version's unresolved issues count
getVersionUnresolvedIssues.description: Returns counts of the issues and unresolved issues for the project version

getDynamicWebhooksForApp.title: Get dynamic webhooks for app
getDynamicWebhooksForApp.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of the webhooks registered by the calling app

getFailedWebhooks.title: Get failed webhooks
getFailedWebhooks.description: Returns webhooks that have recently failed to be delivered to the requesting app after the maximum number of retries

getAllWorkflows.title: Get all workflows
getAllWorkflows.description: Returns all workflows in Jira or a workflow

getWorkflowTransitionRuleConfigurations.title: Get workflow transition rule configurations
getWorkflowTransitionRuleConfigurations.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of workflows with transition rules

getWorkflowsPaginated.title: Get workflows paginated
getWorkflowsPaginated.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of published classic workflows

getWorkflowTransitionProperties.title: Get workflow transition properties
getWorkflowTransitionProperties.description: Returns the properties on a workflow transition

getAllWorkflowSchemes.title: Get all workflow schemes
getAllWorkflowSchemes.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of all workflow schemes, not including draft workflow schemes

getWorkflowSchemeProjectAssociations.title: Get workflow scheme project associations
getWorkflowSchemeProjectAssociations.description: Returns a list of the workflow schemes associated with a list of projects

getDefaultWorkflow.title: Get default workflow
getDefaultWorkflow.description: Returns the default workflow for a workflow scheme

getWorkflowSchemeDraft.title: Get draft workflow scheme
getWorkflowSchemeDraft.description: Returns the draft workflow scheme for an active workflow scheme

getDraftDefaultWorkflow.title: Get draft default workflow
getDraftDefaultWorkflow.description: Returns the default workflow for a workflow scheme's draft

getDraftWorkflow.title: Get issue types for workflows in draft workflow scheme
getDraftWorkflow.description: Returns the workflow-issue type mappings for a workflow scheme's draft

getWorkflow.title: Get issue types for workflows in workflow scheme
getWorkflow.description: Returns the workflow-issue type mappings for a workflow scheme

getIdsOfWorklogsDeletedSince.title: Get IDs of deleted worklogs
getIdsOfWorklogsDeletedSince.description: Returns a list of IDs and delete timestamps for worklogs deleted after a date and time

getIdsOfWorklogsModifiedSince.title: Get IDs of updated worklogs
getIdsOfWorklogsModifiedSince.description: Returns a list of IDs and update timestamps for worklogs updated after a date and time

AddonPropertiesResource_getAddonProperti.title: Get app properties
AddonPropertiesResource_getAddonProperti.description: Gets all the properties of an app

DynamicModulesResource_getModules_get.title: Get modules
DynamicModulesResource_getModules_get.description: Returns all modules registered dynamically by the calling app

updateMultipleCustomFieldValues.title: Update custom fields
updateMultipleCustomFieldValues.description: Updates the value of one or more custom fields on one or more issues

updateCustomFieldConfiguration.title: Update custom field configurations
updateCustomFieldConfiguration.description: Update the configuration for contexts of a custom field created by a [Forge app](https://developer

updateCustomFieldValue.title: Update custom field value
updateCustomFieldValue.description: Updates the value of a custom field on one or more issues

setApplicationProperty.title: Set application property
setApplicationProperty.description: Changes the value of an application property

getAttachmentContent.title: Get attachment content
getAttachmentContent.description: Returns the contents of an attachment

getAttachmentThumbnail.title: Get attachment thumbnail
getAttachmentThumbnail.description: Returns the thumbnail of an attachment

getAttachment.title: Get attachment metadata
getAttachment.description: Returns the metadata for an attachment

removeAttachment.title: Delete attachment
removeAttachment.description: Deletes an attachment from an issue

getCommentsByIds.title: Get comments by IDs
getCommentsByIds.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of comments specified by a list of comment IDs

getCommentProperty.title: Get comment property
getCommentProperty.description: Returns the value of a comment property

setCommentProperty.title: Set comment property
setCommentProperty.description: Creates or updates the value of a property for a comment

getDashboardItemProperty.title: Get dashboard item property
getDashboardItemProperty.description: Returns the key and value of a dashboard item property

setDashboardItemProperty.title: Set dashboard item property
setDashboardItemProperty.description: Sets the value of a dashboard item property

updateDashboard.title: Update dashboard
updateDashboard.description: Updates a dashboard, replacing all the dashboard details with those provided

evaluateJiraExpression.title: Evaluate Jira expression
evaluateJiraExpression.description: Evaluates a Jira expression and returns its value

setDefaultValues.title: Set custom field contexts default values
setDefaultValues.description: Sets default for contexts of a custom field

getCustomFieldContextsForProjectsAndIssu.title: Get custom field contexts for projects and issue types
getCustomFieldContextsForProjectsAndIssu.description: Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of project and issue type mappings and, for each mapping, the ID of a [custom field context](https://confluence

addIssueTypesToContext.title: Add issue types to context
addIssueTypesToContext.description: Adds issue types to a custom field context, appending the issue types to the issue types list

removeIssueTypesFromContext.title: Remove issue types from context
removeIssueTypesFromContext.description: Removes issue types from a custom field context

updateCustomFieldOption.title: Update custom field options (context)
updateCustomFieldOption.description: Updates the options of a custom field

createCustomFieldOption.title: Create custom field options (context)
createCustomFieldOption.description: Creates options and, where the custom select field is of the type Select List (cascading), cascading options for a custom select field

reorderCustomFieldOptions.title: Reorder custom field options (context)
reorderCustomFieldOptions.description: Changes the order of custom field options or cascading options in a context

assignProjectsToCustomFieldContext.title: Assign custom field context to projects
assignProjectsToCustomFieldContext.description: Assigns a custom field context to projects

removeCustomFieldContextFromProjects.title: Remove custom field context from projects
removeCustomFieldContextFromProjects.description: Removes a custom field context from projects

createIssueFieldOption.title: Create issue field option
createIssueFieldOption.description: Creates an option for a select list issue field

getIssueFieldOption.title: Get issue field option
getIssueFieldOption.description: Returns an option from a select list issue field

updateIssueFieldOption.title: Update issue field option
updateIssueFieldOption.description: Updates or creates an option for a select list issue field

deleteIssueFieldOption.title: Delete issue field option
deleteIssueFieldOption.description: Deletes an option from a select list issue field

replaceIssueFieldOption.title: Replace issue field option
replaceIssueFieldOption.description: Deselects an issue-field select-list option from all issues where it is selected

restoreCustomField.title: Restore custom field from trash
restoreCustomField.description: Restores a custom field from trash

trashCustomField.title: Move custom field to trash
trashCustomField.description: Moves a custom field to trash

assignFieldConfigurationSchemeToProject.title: Assign field configuration scheme to project
assignFieldConfigurationSchemeToProject.description: Assigns a field configuration scheme to a project

setDefaultShareScope.title: Set default share scope
setDefaultShareScope.description: Sets the default sharing for new filters and dashboards for a user

setColumns.title: Set columns
setColumns.description: Sets the columns for a filter

resetColumns.title: Reset columns
resetColumns.description: Reset the user's column configuration for the filter to the default

setFavouriteForFilter.title: Add filter as favorite
setFavouriteForFilter.description: Add a filter as a favorite for the user

deleteFavouriteForFilter.title: Remove filter as favorite
deleteFavouriteForFilter.description: Removes a filter as a favorite for the user

addSharePermission.title: Add share permission
addSharePermission.description: Add a share permissions to a filter

getSharePermission.title: Get share permission
getSharePermission.description: Returns a share permission for a filter

deleteSharePermission.title: Delete share permission
deleteSharePermission.description: Deletes a share permission from a filter

addUserToGroup.title: Add user to group
addUserToGroup.description: Adds a user to a group

removeUserFromGroup.title: Remove user from group
removeUserFromGroup.description: Removes a user from a group

createIssue.title: Create issue
createIssue.description: Creates an issue or, where the option to create subtasks is enabled in Jira, a subtask

createIssues.title: Bulk create issue
createIssues.description: Creates issues and, where the option to create subtasks is enabled in Jira, subtasks

bulkSetIssuesProperties.title: Bulk set issues properties
bulkSetIssuesProperties.description: Sets the values of entity properties on issues

bulkSetIssueProperty.title: Bulk set issue property
bulkSetIssueProperty.description: Sets a property value on multiple issues

bulkDeleteIssueProperty.title: Bulk delete issue property
bulkDeleteIssueProperty.description: Deletes a property value from multiple issues

getIssue.title: Get issue
getIssue.description: Returns the details for an issue

assignIssue.title: Assign issue
assignIssue.description: Assigns an issue to a user

addAttachment.title: Add attachment
addAttachment.description: Adds one or more attachments to an issue

getChangeLogsByIds.title: Get changelogs by IDs
getChangeLogsByIds.description: Returns changelogs for an issue specified by a list of changelog IDs

addComment.title: Add comment
addComment.description: Adds a comment to an issue

notify.title: Send notification for issue
notify.description: Creates an email notification for an issue and adds it to the mail queue

getIssueProperty.title: Get issue property
getIssueProperty.description: Returns the key and value of an issue's property

setIssueProperty.title: Set issue property
setIssueProperty.description: Sets the value of an issue's property

createOrUpdateRemoteIssueLink.title: Create or update remote issue link
createOrUpdateRemoteIssueLink.description: Creates or updates a remote issue link for an issue

deleteRemoteIssueLinkByGlobalId.title: Delete remote issue link by global ID
deleteRemoteIssueLinkByGlobalId.description: Deletes the remote issue link from the issue using the link's global ID

getRemoteIssueLinkById.title: Get remote issue link by ID
getRemoteIssueLinkById.description: Returns a remote issue link for an issue

updateRemoteIssueLink.title: Update remote issue link by ID
updateRemoteIssueLink.description: Updates a remote issue link for an issue

deleteRemoteIssueLinkById.title: Delete remote issue link by ID
deleteRemoteIssueLinkById.description: Deletes a remote issue link from an issue

doTransition.title: Transition issue
doTransition.description: Performs an issue transition and, if the transition has a screen, updates the fields from the transition screen

addVote.title: Add vote
addVote.description: Adds the user's vote to an issue

removeVote.title: Delete vote
removeVote.description: Deletes a user's vote from an issue

addWatcher.title: Add watcher
addWatcher.description: Adds a user as a watcher of an issue by passing the account ID of the user

removeWatcher.title: Delete watcher
removeWatcher.description: Deletes a user as a watcher of an issue

addWorklog.title: Add worklog
addWorklog.description: Adds a worklog to an issue

deleteWorklog.title: Delete worklog
deleteWorklog.description: Deletes a worklog from an issue

getWorklogProperty.title: Get worklog property
getWorklogProperty.description: Returns the value of a worklog property

setWorklogProperty.title: Set worklog property
setWorklogProperty.description: Sets the value of a worklog property

linkIssues.title: Create issue link
linkIssues.description: Creates a link between two issues

getIssueSecurityScheme.title: Get issue security scheme
getIssueSecurityScheme.description: Returns an issue security scheme along with its security levels

createIssueType.title: Create issue type
createIssueType.description: Creates an issue type and adds it to the default issue type scheme

createIssueTypeAvatar.title: Load issue type avatar
createIssueTypeAvatar.description: Loads an avatar for the issue type

getIssueTypeProperty.title: Get issue type property
getIssueTypeProperty.description: Returns the key and value of the [issue type property](https://developer

setIssueTypeProperty.title: Set issue type property
setIssueTypeProperty.description: Creates or updates the value of the [issue type property](https://developer

assignIssueTypeSchemeToProject.title: Assign issue type scheme to project
assignIssueTypeSchemeToProject.description: Assigns an issue type scheme to a project

addIssueTypesToIssueTypeScheme.title: Add issue types to issue type scheme
addIssueTypesToIssueTypeScheme.description: Adds issue types to an issue type scheme

reorderIssueTypesInIssueTypeScheme.title: Change order of issue types
reorderIssueTypesInIssueTypeScheme.description: Changes the order of issue types in an issue type scheme

removeIssueTypeFromIssueTypeScheme.title: Remove issue type from issue type scheme
removeIssueTypeFromIssueTypeScheme.description: Removes an issue type from an issue type scheme

createIssueTypeScreenScheme.title: Create issue type screen scheme
createIssueTypeScreenScheme.description: Creates an issue type screen scheme

assignIssueTypeScreenSchemeToProject.title: Assign issue type screen scheme to project
assignIssueTypeScreenSchemeToProject.description: Assigns an issue type screen scheme to a project

updateIssueTypeScreenScheme.title: Update issue type screen scheme
updateIssueTypeScreenScheme.description: Updates an issue type screen scheme

deleteIssueTypeScreenScheme.title: Delete issue type screen scheme
deleteIssueTypeScreenScheme.description: Deletes an issue type screen scheme

appendMappingsForIssueTypeScreenScheme.title: Append mappings to issue type screen scheme
appendMappingsForIssueTypeScreenScheme.description: Appends issue type to screen scheme mappings to an issue type screen scheme

updateDefaultScreenScheme.title: Update issue type screen scheme default screen scheme
updateDefaultScreenScheme.description: Updates the default screen scheme of an issue type screen scheme

removeMappingsFromIssueTypeScreenScheme.title: Remove mappings from issue type screen scheme
removeMappingsFromIssueTypeScreenScheme.description: Removes issue type to screen scheme mappings from an issue type screen scheme

getAutoCompletePost.title: Get field reference data (POST)
getAutoCompletePost.description: Returns reference data for JQL searches

matchIssues.title: Check issues against JQL
matchIssues.description: Checks whether one or more issues would be returned by one or more JQL queries

migrateQueries.title: Convert user identifiers to account IDs in JQL queries
migrateQueries.description: Converts one or more JQL queries with user identifiers (username or user key) to equivalent JQL queries with account IDs

setPreference.title: Set preference
setPreference.description: Creates a preference for the user or updates a preference's value by sending a plain text string

removePreference.title: Delete preference
removePreference.description: Deletes a preference of the user, which restores the default value of system defined settings

setLocale.title: Set locale
setLocale.description: Deprecated, use [ Update a user profile](https://developer

deleteLocale.title: Delete locale
deleteLocale.description: Deprecated, use [ Update a user profile](https://developer

Returns:

| Project Type Key | Project Template Key |  
|--|--|  
| `business` | `com
